definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
descriptive geometry (three-dimensional geometry using projections and elevations)

sentences.english: However, Li Keran maintained traditional Chinese brushstroke techniques and painting skills.
sentences.chinese: 然而，李可染的畫法又靠了傳統筆畫的表現手法。

sentences.english: Perspective illustration provides a three-dimensional view of objects or views.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法了對物體或景色的三維視角。

sentences.english: The painting of this picture is quite unique, and we can't see it somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫的畫法相當獨特，在其他地方是看不到的。

sentences.english: By employing the seemingly miraculous backhand painting technique, the art compacts the universe into a small space.
sentences.chinese: 它用神奇的內部反手畫法將乾坤融於方寸之間。

sentences.english: Perspective was invented during the Italian Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法是在意大利文藝復興期間發明的。

sentences.english: I would ask you to believe that such an enchantment took place in its time.
sentences.chinese: 我想要你們相信，這種障眼畫法在當時盛行。

sentences.english: A practical configuration method of suction chamber in double-suction pump is given here in detail.
sentences.chinese: 同時給出了雙吸泵吸水室的具體畫法。

sentences.english: The objects in the background are out of perspective.
sentences.chinese: 背景上畫的物體不合透視畫法。

sentences.english: Encaustic painting was the ancient method of fixing pigments with heated wax.
sentences.chinese: 蠟畫是一種古老的畫法，它將顏料與加熱的蠟混合。

sentences.english: Perspective illustr provides a three-dimensionwouls view of objects or views.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法提供了一個對物體或形勢的三維視角。

sentences.english: The Study of Iodine Contained Polarizer's Stretching and Dyeing Process via the Design of …
sentences.chinese: 實驗計畫法在碘系偏光膜延伸染色製程條件之研究。

sentences.english: Perblueprinttive analogy accommodates a three-dimensional appearance of objects or views.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法供給了一個對物體或風景的三維視角。

sentences.english: Spirit the surface using long, straight strokes.
The thesis first came up with a problem in projective geometry.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先給出了一道畫法幾何題。

sentences.english: The suggested one is more effective for drawing generation of questions in descriptive geometry.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法有助於提高求解畫法幾何問題的作圖效率。

sentences.english: Perblueprinttive analogy accommodates a three-ambital appearance of altar or angle.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法供給了一個對物體或風景的三維視角。

definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
